Gangon was not enjoying this....he didn't like feeling alone...he walked
from the other side of the base while shooting until he came to
BrightBlade.... "i hate this!..." he said angrily......all that's happening
is i'm getting shot full of holes....he had a hole through his chest and you
could clearly see through if not for his spark in the way......he kept his
hand over his chest wound but was trying to find a way to keep something
over the OTHER side of the hole at the same time!........he stuck close to
BrightBlade firing upon the autoguns......
----- Original Message -----
From: "Moon Mist" <shadowwarrior_ax@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Friday, April 28, 2000 1:56 AM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


>
>
>
> * BrightBlade smiled as she pulled out her hot-wired gun and aimed at the
> Maximal ship, she had had a chance to repair in her Beast Mode on the way
> there. She fired at one of the top auto-guns and smiled as it exploded,
she
> HAD done a good job rewiring this weapon!
> BrightBlade looked over at the others as they continued to attack the Ark,
> were they having as much fun as she was?
> She sighed, when were the Maximals going to come out and play? She'd love
to
> have a chance to shoot at one of them rather then an auto-gun, or maybe
even
> have a chance to sneak inside and get the drop on a few.
> BrightBlade snickered, she was going to enjoy this! :)
